meanings.sent1: The archdiocesan cathedral is a beautiful place of worship.
meanings.sent2: The archdiocesan leader oversees many churches in the region.
meanings.sent3: The archdiocesan picnic was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as vast as an archdiocesan territory.
meanings.sent5: The archdiocesan traditions are deeply rooted in history.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to an archdiocese.
meanings.sent1: The archdiocesan schools provide education to many students.
meanings.sent2: The archdiocesan boundaries are clearly defined.
meanings.sent3: The archdiocesan bake sale raised funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: His influence in the community was archdiocesan in nature.
meanings.sent5: The archdiocesan events bring people together in unity.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of an archdiocese.
meanings.sent1: The archdiocesan staff work tirelessly to serve the community.
meanings.sent2: The archdiocesan regulations ensure order within the churches.
meanings.sent3: The archdiocesan choir sang beautifully at the service.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was archdiocesan in its commitment.
meanings.sent5: The archdiocesan architecture reflects a rich history of faith.
